title: Peter G. Mirto
content:
Peter G. Mirto (April 13, 1915 â€“ March 5, 2001) was an American politician who served in the New York State Assembly from 1969 to 1978.[1]

He died on March 5, 2001, in Glen Cove, New York at age 85.[2]
